categories.category: Companies based in New York City
Internet advertising services and affiliate networks

parameters.key_people: Yasuhisa "Yaz" Iida, Co-PresidentJonathan Levine, Co-President products Search Marketing (SEM), Affiliate Marketing, Lead Generation

bdy.p: LinkShare Corporation provides ecommerce businesses with a range of online marketing services including Search Marketing (SEM), Lead Generation and Affiliate Marketing. Advertisers can increase their online sales by leveraging LinkShare's extensive performance marketing network, along with consultative services and patented technology. Superior service combined with technology innovation allows advertisers and publishers to acquire and retain new customers, increase revenue and drive results.

LinkShare boasts that it has created the largest network of affiliate partners of any program provider -- over 10 million partnerships -- in addition to becoming the first affiliate network provider to achieve sustained profitability. LinkShare also lays claim to being a pioneer in online affiliate marketing. The LinkShare network is touted by the company as the largest pay for performance affiliate marketing network on the Internet 1.

LinkShare clients are
Fortune 500 and prominent companies doing business online, and include J.C. Penney, 1-800-Flowers.com,
American Express ,
Avon Products and many others.

sec.p: The LinkShare Corporation (LinkShare) was founded in 1996 by Stephen Messer and Heidi Messer and is headquartered in New York City, with offices in San Francisco, Chicago, Tampa, Tokyo and London, UK.

LinkShare Corporation is the wholly owned U.S. division of
Rakuten
, Inc., a top Japanese shopping portal.2 Rakuten acquired LinkShare in 2005 for $425 Million in cash.3

LinkShare offers a number of services to online merchants. The primary services are:
LinkShare Affiliate Marketing Network - Affiliate Program Management and Tracking platform which uses Linkshare's patented non cookie-based tracking technology
LinkShare Search Advantage, which includes Paid Placement, Paid Inclusion and Search Affiliate Management Services
LinkShare MediaTracker, which provides tracking and reporting beyond affiliate marketing, including email campaigns and display advertising campaigns
LinkShare Lead Advantage, a Lead Generation solution which offers Advertisers looking for customer leads LinkShare technology and services

sec.st: Video, Flash and Rich Media: Flex Links
sec.p: Publishers are always on the lookout for new ways to stand out among the crowd and thatâ€™s why we developed Flex Links. Publishers can work together with advertisers using Flex Links to create rich, interactive links containing video, Flash, and Javascript. Using Flex Links you can deploy more interactive and dynamic content leading to higher rates of interaction and conversion to sale.

LinkShare Flex Links enables advertisers and publishers to track revenue through any type of rich content that can be placed on a publisher site. Advertisers and Publishers in the LinkShare Network are now using Flex Links to create product information Widgets using video and Flash. When an advertiser makes Flex Links available as a link type within their program, publishers can copy and paste them onto their site just like any other link.

As data feeds and product information widgets become increasingly adopted among Publisher Web sites, another challenge that comes into focus is the ability to serve up the right products at the right time to make the shopping experience more relevant for your customers. Ultimately this will lead to higher conversion rates and more revenue. To help accomplish this goal LinkShare now offers Easy Links, contextual product ads using intelligent link technology.

ss1.p: The LinkShare Symposium East is an annual conference that provides LinkShare advertisers and publishers the opportunity to meet face-to-face and develop key business relationships. The two day event includes keynote speakers, educational seminars, live networking at the LinkShare DealMaker, and the annual LinkShare Golden Link Awards dinner and ceremony.

The LinkShare Partnership Summit has been rebranded as the LinkShare Symposium West for 2009. This annual event will compliment the LinkShare Symposium East with educational seminars, keynote speakers, and the LinkShare DealMaker, the premier networking forum for LinkShare advertisers and publishers.
LinkShare exhibits at a variety of tradeshows in the U.S. and U.K. Check out where they are now: LinkShare Industry Appearances

LinkShare hosts the annual Golden Link Awards ceremony during the LinkShare Symposium East conference, to celebrate extraordinary achievements in performance-based marketing. The award is given to companies and individuals in the following award categories:

list.entry: MVP - Most Valuable Publisher for Lead Generation

ss1.p:
Awards History and Rules
The first LinkShare Golden Links Awards ceremony was held in New York City during the LinkShare Symposium 2004. Nominations for awards are limited to LinkShare advertisers and publishers in good standing and can be made via a public nomination form. The winners are determined by the E-commerce Council, which consists of representatives of the LinkShare network, LinkShare advertiser and publisher partners, representatives from the affiliate community and other distinguished industry professionals.
Awards Winners: LinkShare Golden Link Awards 2007 - LinkShare Golden Link Awards 2008
